item.description:
Hike in Conservation land areas over trails along marsh, through woods, includes the boardwalk with views of Sandy Neck, Chapin Beach.

Rte 6 to Exit 8, Union Street to Rte 6A. Turn Left, go 1 block, Turn Right on Center St. Go 1.0 mile, follow signs to beach pkg lot at end. Meet at 9:45 a.m. Two hours.

Breakfast at Jack's Outback, 161 Main Street (Route 6A) in Yarmouth Port at 8:15 if you are able to join us. (The suggested directions say get off at Exit 7.  Head north on Willow St. Turn right (east) on Route 6A.  Jack's will be 0.3 miles ahead on the right.  Some comments suggest the place is hard to find, so watch the street address.)

This is an Appalachian Mountain Club walk, led by an AMC leader. You do not have to be a member of the AMC to attend. More info on the AMC is available at http://www.outdoors.org. Dogs are not allowed on AMC hikes.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Gray's Beach
